purpose: The email announces an open position for a post-doctoral researcher in model-driven engineering at Johannes Kepler University Linz, Austria.
evidence_sentences: Open Positions for POST-DOCTORAL RESEARCHER in MODEL-DRIVEN ENGINEERING at the Johannes Kepler University Linz, Austria.
The successful candidate will gain comprehensive experiences in all key areas of postdoctoral training.
We are looking for a post-doctoral researcher who has the desire to make a strong impact on software engineering and model-driven engineering.
The selected candidate will be appointed to a full-time position with an initial term of 3-4 years.
